mapper.select: select s_no, s_title, s_contents, s_startday, s_finishday, s_date,situation,s_type from ( select rownum rn, s_no, s_title, s_contents, s_startday, s_finishday, s_date,situation,s_type from schedule where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
select s_title,s_no,s_startday,s_finishday,situation, trunc(S_FINISHDAY-sysdate,1) AS remainingdays from schedule where sysdate BETWEEN s_startday AND s_finishday AND situation = '진행'
select s_title,s_no,s_startday,s_finishday,situation, trunc(S_FINISHDAY-sysdate,1) AS remainingdays from schedule where s_type = #{s_type} AND situation = '진행'
select count(trunc(S_FINISHDAY-sysdate,0)) AS remainingdays from schedule where situation = '진행'
select s_title, s_contents, s_startday, s_finishday from schedule order by s_no DESC
